```{r}
library(httr2)
req <- request("https:///newsapi.org/v2/everything") 
  req_url_query(
    q = '`"data science"`',
    from = Sys.Date() - 1,
    pageSize = 10,
    apiKey = Sys.getenv("NEWS_API_KEY")
)

resp <- req_perform(req)
resp_body_json(resp)

```
